# static/ — Static Assets

## Purpose
Static assets served directly by Docusaurus — images, videos, logos, and downloadable files.

## Subdirectories
| Folder | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `files/` | Downloadable files (example flow JSON files). |
| `img/` | Documentation images and screenshots. |
| `logos/` | Langflow and platform logos (SVG). |
| `notion_imgs/` | Images imported from Notion. |
| `videos/` | Documentation video files. |
